title: Canada’s Falling as America’s Praying | Guest: Lincoln Jay | 2/21/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show by playing horrifying footage from the protests in Canada over the weekend. A man who attempted to assassinate a Kentucky mayoral candidate was bailed out by Black Lives Matter. Glenn takes calls from listeners in Canada. Video journalist for Rebel News Lincoln Jay joins to share what he saw firsthand at the Canada protests. Glenn takes calls from listeners to gauge how Americans are feeling. Glenn reminds listeners what type of country they should be fighting for.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
